text: avara mele sikseyu banderaguva a dinada kuritu janarannu eccarisiri. Andu akramigalu heluvaru; nam'modeya, namage svalpa samayada mattige kalavakasavannu nidu. Navu ninna kareyannu svikarisuvevu mattu ninna dutarannu anusarisuvevu. (Avarige uttarasiguvudu;) ‘‘nimage antyave illavendu nivu i hinde ane hakuttiralillave?’’
